entry.title: Full-Motion Wall Mount for 40" - 80" TVs
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 224.00

Description

  • Fits most flat and curved panel TVs from 40" - 80" TVs
  • Supports up to 132lbs/60kg at full extension
  • Adjustable forward and backward 15° tilting angles
  • Dual-arm 60° swivel both left and right, depending on screen size
  • TV panel horizontal adjustment up and down 5°
  • VESA sizes from 200x200 to 800x400
  • Full motion arms extend up to 20.25" (51.5cm) from the wall
  • Sits 5" (12.7cm) from the wall when fully retracted
  • Heavy-duty steel construction with powder-coated finish

Enjoy your TV from every angle with this articulating wall mount. This heavy-duty mount is built to accommodate TVs up to 80" and ensures you always have the perfect viewing angle. Tilt your mount forward or backward, or level adjust left or right horizontally to suit your space, while the dual arms provide extra stability for your TV when swiveling. Fully extendable arms provide a wide range of viewing angles suitable for any space in your home.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 17"H X 35"W X 5"D
Product Weight 20 lbs.

Materials Metal

Designed to accommodate most 17" – 37" TVs up to 55lbs, this flat panel wall mount elevates your screen to the optimal viewing angle, while providing a 180º swivel left to right and tilt of -15º/+15 º up and down. The mount also extends up to 11 inches and retracts to a discrete 2 inches from the wall. For a polished look pair this wall mount with your favorite CorLiving TV or component stand.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 9"H X 9"W X 2"D
Product Weight 2 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 3"H X 14"W X 13"D
Carton Shipping Weight 5 lbs.
Materials Metal
Max Weight 55 lbs.
